hero.name: Nicole
hero.description2: user interfaces using modern frontend technologies.

about.subtitle: Introduction
about.title: Overview.
about.description: I'm a Systems Engineering student and passionate FrontEnd developer with experience in TypeScript, JavaScript, and React. I enjoy learning new technologies and building modern, user-friendly interfaces. I'm always looking to improve my skills and grow as a developer.

work.subtitle: Personal Projects
work.title: Projects.
work.description: The following projects highlight my technical skills and creativity through real-world applications I've developed.

spendwise.name: Spend Wise
spendwise.description: A single-page web application (SPA) that allows users to manage personal budgets, record transactions, and visualize financial trends in real-time through data synchronization and interactive charts.

streammax.name: Stream Max
streammax.description: A single-page web application (SPA) that allows users to explore, search, and organize movies and series using the TMDB API, with dynamic routing and persistent favorites list.

shophub.name: Shop Hub
shophub.description: A single-page e-commerce web application (SPA) built with React that allows users to search, filter, and purchase products with real-time search and a smooth cart experience.
